name: Pizza Time (skolczynski)
description: In Pizza Time, you have been transported back to the1950s, and there’s only one thing you can do: Pizza Delivery. Hop across the hoods of cars, scale obstacles, and deliver pizzas to hungry customers. But watch out for the crows! They’re everywhere, and they absolutely HATE Italian goodness. Will you make it in time for the 29 minute guarantee? Find out today!
